1.successMessage: Great job! Lets try another example. Click the right arrow.
1.failureMessage: Oops! Don't worry, try again on the next word! Click the right arrow

2.startingMessage: This one is a little more tricky but I think you can get it.
2.successMessage: Awesome! You go the hang of this.
2.failureMessage: What a great way to learn words, try again on the next one :)

3.startingMessage: Getting trickier, give it your best shot
3.failureMessage: It's okay, not everyone spent their summer holidays reading dictionaries

4.startingMessage: I'm gonna stoke you with this one.
4.successMessage: Are you sure you're not cheating?
4.failureMessage: Honestly I didn't even know half these words existed.

5.startingMessage: It's getting a bit anti-easy now.
5.successMessage: I did not anti-cipate you'd be this good.
5.failureMessage: You're gonna be anti-me by the time this is done.

6.successMessage: Smarty pants with your smarty instincts. Thought I would've got you on this one.
6.failureMessage: Gotcha! There can be more than one fake word.

7.successMessage: You're a confident one aren't you. PS this is all for now, more levels soon.
7.failureMessage: You're probably starting to have trust issues right about now... PS this is all for now, more levels soon.
